verses.verse: תִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> Canst thou draw out לִוְיָתָ֣ן <WH3882> leviathan בְּחַכָּ֑ה <WH2443> angle וּ֝בְחֶ֗בֶל <WH2256> with a cord תַּשְׁקִ֥יעַ <WH8257> [which] thou lettest down לְשֹׁנֽוֹ׃ <WH3956> his tongue
הֲתָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> Canst thou put אַגְמ֣וֹן <WH100> an hook בְּאַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> his nose וּ֝בְח֗וֹחַ <WH2336> bramble תִּקּ֥וֹב <WH5344> pierce לֶֽחֱיוֹ׃ <WH3895> his jaw

הֲיַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH7235> Will he make many אֵ֭לֶיךָ <WH413> about תַּחֲנוּנִ֑ים <WH8469> supplications אִם־ <WH518> Or יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> unto thee? will he speak אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> to you רַכּֽוֹת׃ <WH7390> soft
הֲיִכְרֹ֣ת <WH3772> Will he make בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> a covenant עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> will you תִּ֝קָּחֶ֗נּוּ <WH3947> with thee? wilt thou take לְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> him for a servant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> alway
הַֽתְשַׂחֶק־ <WH7832> Wilt thou play בּ֭וֹ כַּצִּפּ֑וֹר <WH6833> A bird וְ֝תִקְשְׁרֶ֗נּוּ <WH7194> bind לְנַעֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5291> damsel
יִכְר֣וּ <WH3738> dig עָ֭לָיו <WH5921> over חַבָּרִ֑ים <WH2271> Shall the companions יֶ֝חֱצ֗וּהוּ <WH2673> of him? shall they part בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among כְּֽנַעֲנִֽים׃ <WH3669> Canaanite
הַֽתְמַלֵּ֣א <WH4390> Canst thou fill בְשֻׂכּ֣וֹת <WH7905> harpoons עוֹר֑וֹ <WH5785> his skin וּבְצִלְצַ֖ל <WH6767> cymbal דָּגִ֣ים <WH1709> with fish רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> his head
שִׂים־ <WH7760> Lay עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and כַּפֶּ֑ךָ <WH3709> thine hand זְכֹ֥ר <WH2142> upon him remember מִ֝לְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> the battle אַל־ <WH408> shall not תּוֹסַֽף׃ <WH3254> do no more

הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold תֹּחַלְתּ֥וֹ <WH8431> Behold the hope נִכְזָ֑בָה <WH3576> of him is in vain הֲגַ֖ם <WH1571> even אֶל־ <WH408> nay מַרְאָ֣יו <WH4758> even at the sight יֻטָֽל׃ <WH2904> shall not [one] be cast down

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No אַ֭כְזָר <WH393> None [is so] fierce כִּ֣י <WH3588> dares יְעוּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH5782> to arouse וּמִ֥י <WH4310> Who ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he לְפָנַ֥י <WH6440> before יִתְיַצָּֽב׃ <WH3320> who then is able to stand

מִ֣י <WH4310> Who הִ֭קְדִּימַנִי <WH6923> Who hath prevented וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> me that I should repay תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> [him? whatsoever is] under the whole heaven לִי־ הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

[לֹא־ כ] (לֹֽו־ <WH3808> I will not אַחֲרִ֥ישׁ <WH2790> I will not conceal ק) בַּדָּ֑יו <WH905> his limbs וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> act גְּ֝בוּר֗וֹת <WH1369> his mighty וְחִ֣ין <WH2433> nor his comely עֶרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH6187> proportion

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who גִ֭לָּה <WH1540> Who can discover פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face לְבוּשׁ֑וֹ <WH3830> apparel בְּכֶ֥פֶל <WH3718> [to him] with his double רִ֝סְנ֗וֹ <WH7448> bridle מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> come
דַּלְתֵ֣י <WH1817> the doors פָ֭נָיו <WH6440> accept מִ֣י <WH4310> Who פִתֵּ֑חַ <WH6605> Who can open סְבִיב֖וֹת <WH5439> round about שִׁנָּ֣יו <WH8127> his teeth אֵימָֽה׃ <WH367> [are] terrible
גַּ֭אֲוָה <WH1346> [are his] pride אֲפִיקֵ֣י <WH650> brook מָֽגִנִּ֑ים <WH4043> scales סָ֝ג֗וּר <WH5462> shut up together חוֹתָ֥ם <WH2368> seal צָֽר׃ <WH6862> [as with] a close
אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> One בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> to another יִגַּ֑שׁוּ <WH5066> is so near וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> that no air לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָב֥וֹא <WH935> can come בֵֽינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH996> between

אִישׁ־ <WH376> one בְּאָחִ֥יהוּ <WH251> to another יְדֻבָּ֑קוּ <WH1692> They are joined יִ֝תְלַכְּד֗וּ <WH3920> they stick together וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and cannot יִתְפָּרָֽדוּ׃ <WH6504> that they cannot be sundered

עֲ‍ֽ֭טִישֹׁתָיו <WH5846> By his neesings תָּ֣הֶל <WH1984> doth shine א֑וֹר <WH216> a light וְ֝עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> and his eyes כְּעַפְעַפֵּי־ <WH6079> [are] like the eyelids שָֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> of the morning
מִ֭פִּיו <WH6310> Out of his mouth לַפִּידִ֣ים <WH3940> burning lamps יַהֲלֹ֑כוּ <WH1980> go כִּיד֥וֹדֵי <WH3590> [and] sparks אֵ֝֗שׁ <WH784> of fire יִתְמַלָּֽטוּ׃ <WH4422> leap out
מִ֭נְּחִירָיו <WH5156> Out of his nostrils יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> goeth עָשָׁ֑ן <WH6227> smoke כְּד֖וּד <WH1731> pot נָפ֣וּחַ <WH5301> as [out] of a seething וְאַגְמֹֽן׃ <WH100> or caldron
נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> His breath גֶּחָלִ֣ים <WH1513> coals תְּלַהֵ֑ט <WH3857> kindleth וְ֝לַ֗הַב <WH3851> and a flame מִפִּ֥יו <WH6310> of his mouth יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> goeth out
בְּֽ֭צַוָּארוֹ <WH6677> In his neck יָלִ֣ין <WH3885> remaineth עֹ֑ז <WH5797> strength וּ֝לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before תָּד֥וּץ <WH1750> is turned into joy דְּאָבָֽה׃ <WH1670> and sorrow

מַפְּלֵ֣י <WH4651> The flakes בְשָׂר֣וֹ <WH1320> of his flesh דָבֵ֑קוּ <WH1692> are joined together יָצ֥וּק <WH3332> they are firm עָ֝לָ֗יו <WH5921> and בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> in themselves they cannot be moved
לִ֭בּוֹ <WH3820> His heart יָצ֣וּק <WH3332> is as firm כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> as אָ֑בֶן <WH68> as a stone וְ֝יָצ֗וּק <WH3332> yea as hard כְּפֶ֣לַח <WH6400> as a piece תַּחְתִּֽית׃ <WH8482> of the nether
מִ֭שֵּׂתוֹ <WH7613> When he raiseth up יָג֣וּרוּ <WH1481> are afraid אֵלִ֑ים <WH410> the mighty מִ֝שְּׁבָרִ֗ים <WH7667> by reason of breakings יִתְחַטָּֽאוּ׃ <WH2398> they purify

מַשִּׂיגֵ֣הוּ <WH5381> of him that layeth חֶ֭רֶב <WH2719> The sword בְּלִ֣י <WH1097> cannot תָק֑וּם <WH6965> at him cannot hold חֲנִ֖ית <WH2595> the spear מַסָּ֣ע <WH4551> the dart וְשִׁרְיָֽה׃ <WH8302> nor the habergeon
יַחְשֹׁ֣ב <WH2803> He esteemeth לְתֶ֣בֶן <WH8401> as straw בַּרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> iron לְעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> wood רִקָּב֣וֹן <WH7539> as rotten נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <WH5154> [and] brass

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יַבְרִיחֶ֥נּוּ <WH1272> cannot make him flee בֶן־ <WH1121> the arrow קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> arch לְ֝קַ֗שׁ <WH7179> with him into stubble נֶהְפְּכוּ־ <WH2015> are turned ל֥וֹ אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones קָֽלַע׃ <WH7050> hanging
כְּ֭קַשׁ <WH7179> as stubble נֶחְשְׁב֣וּ <WH2803> are counted תוֹתָ֑ח <WH8455> Darts וְ֝יִשְׂחַ֗ק <WH7832> he laugheth לְרַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> at the shaking כִּידֽוֹן׃ <WH3591> of a spear

תַּ֭חְתָּיו <WH8478> his underparts חַדּ֣וּדֵי <WH2303> Sharp חָ֑רֶשׂ <WH2789> stones יִרְפַּ֖ד <WH7502> [are] under him he spreadeth חָר֣וּץ <WH2742> sharp pointed things עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on טִֽיט׃ <WH2916> upon the mire
יַרְתִּ֣יחַ <WH7570> to boil כַּסִּ֣יר <WH5518> like a pot מְצוּלָ֑ה <WH4688> He maketh the deep יָ֝֗ם <WH3220> the sea יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> he maketh כַּמֶּרְקָחָֽה׃ <WH4841> like a pot of ointment

אַ֭חֲרָיו <WH310> after יָאִ֣יר <WH215> to shine נָתִ֑יב <WH5410> He maketh a path יַחְשֹׁ֖ב <WH2803> him [one] would think תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> the deep לְשֵׂיבָֽה׃ <WH7872> [to be] hoary אֵֽין־ <WH369> else עַל־ <WH5921> on
עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> Upon earth מָשְׁל֑וֹ <WH4915> there is not his like הֶ֝עָשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> who is made לִבְלִי־ <WH1097> without חָֽת׃ <WH2844> fear אֵֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> that

גָּבֹ֥הַּ <WH1364> all high יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> He beholdeth ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> He מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> [things] he [is] a king עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> everything בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> over all the children שָֽׁחַץ׃ <WH7830> of pride ס
